6 hours ago, Sky Kerman said:

OHH u mean like the GENESIS command pod? or in ksp known as the mk 2 cockpit.

Maybe you mean Gemini? The one that used a 100% oxygen atmosphere inside it so if they had ever needed to eject from it, the two astronauts would have been instantly incinerated?

I don’t expect more LES in KSP2, mostly because the focus is much more on building colonies and then ships in space, rather than launching from the surface of Kerbin where an LES might actually be useful. KSP doesn’t really need a launch escape anyway as unless you’re using SRBs you can just turn the engines off and decouple without having to worry about fuel tanks breaking up and exploding etc. which is the main reason for using LES on real rockets.
